name: deebo-setup
description: System installer for Deebo debugging tool

scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -u 1 src/deebo_guide.md build/ && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const os = require('os'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const homeDir = os.homedir(); const deeboPath = path.join(homeDir, '.deebo'); const guidePath = path.join(homeDir, '.deebo-guide'); fs.mkdirSync(guidePath, { recursive: true }); const srcPath = path.join(process.cwd(), 'build/guide-server.js'); const destDeeboPath = path.join(deeboPath, 'guide-server.js'); const destGuidePath = path.join(guidePath, 'guide-server.js'); fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destDeeboPath); fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destGuidePath); const packageJson = { type: 'module', dependencies: { '@modelcontextprotocol/sdk': '^1.0.0', 'zod': '^3.22.4' } }; fs.writeFileSync(path.join(guidePath, 'package.json'), JSON.stringify(packageJson, null, 2)); try { execSync('npm install', { cwd: guidePath }); console.log('Dependencies installed in .deebo-guide directory'); } catch (err) { console.error('Failed to install dependencies:', err); }"
